title: 安装mod后崩溃
author: 凛
txt_content:

WARNING: coremods are present:
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

replies.txt_content:
C似水流年 发表于 2016-10-3 13:45
voidcraft出问题了，删掉
看来在下个版本出来前
是汉化不了了
